title: Physiology Practical Education Curriculum Utilizing Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Life Science Terminology and Human Anatomy
context.additional_context: Non-Degree Course for Current Practitioners, Conducted in a Blended Learning Format Combining Simulation/VR and Online in a BYOD Environment. Learning Outcomes Measured Through Comprehensive Assessment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain the physiological mechanisms of major body systems (respiratory, circulatory) in a simulation environment.
Learners can diagnose physiological abnormalities based on clinical cases and propose intervention strategies using VR tools.
Learners can develop three or more practical applications of physiology concepts through peer feedback on an online collaborative platform.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
